snippet.title: CounterAttack: Uprising Update 1.1.5
snippet.description:
More Attachments! Bigger Ships! New Abilities! Dangerous Attachments! Improved online matchmaking! Out Now!

Update 1.1.5 brings a lot of fixes and improvements. The massive Dreadnaught on Gate is fully equipped with multiple beams, blasters, and PDLs. Many new active abilities in the form of Actions bring new ways to play. Bring your offline saves online and your online saves offline - more flexibility! A new cross-region global lobby to make finding online games easier!

CounterAttack: Uprising is available for Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and Steam (Windows, Linux, Mac)!

Online co-op SHMUP with deep customization and cross-platform play! Team up or fight solo, 1 - 4 player local or up to 8 players cross-platform online co-op, unlock upgrades, use powerful ultimate abilities, enhance your ship the way you want, and save the Earth from annihilation.

https://CounterAttackUprising.com/

Nintendo Switch
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/counterattack-uprising-switch/

Xbox One
https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/counterattack/9nd0qv2nqrm0?cid=CounterAttackUprising

Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/451600/CounterAttack/
